title: <no title>
body:
Stores: Managing the Fields of a Store

Fields are the details that will be requested of a customer when they are beginning the checkout process.
By default, you must have First Name, Last Name, and Email Address as fields. These fields are invariable and can not be deleted or edited.
To manage the fields of a store, you will need to have navigated to the store. Refer here if you are having trouble reaching this point.

  1. Click Fields

  2. Click and Edit Field to edit a contact field

  3. Click and Delete Field to delete a contact field

  4. Click Add Field to add a contact field

    • Add an existing contact field or create and add a custom field

  5. Click Done
